Text: Secondment to EnronMr Shapiro Im emailing you at the suggestion of Paul Dawson in London My colleague Ian Fletcher has discussed with Mark Schroeder and Paul the possibility of arranging a secondment to Enron from my current post at the UK Governments Department of Trade Industry DTI I am hoping to arrange a suitable posting to start late September and to last around two years I would optimally like to be based in or around Los Angeles so that I can live with my wife who will be in LA for the next two years but understand that for Enron San Francisco is likely to be the closest location with any openings I attach a copy of my CV which outlines my experience skills and achievements to date You will see that I have already established a successful and varied career in the public sector most recently in the energy sector At this point I am looking for an opportunity to acquire real commercial experience using the skills Ive already proved whilst building up new ones My colleague Maureen Verrall manages the DTIs secondment team and would be able to talk through the practical and financial details Would it be possible for us to have a phone conversation at some point in the next few days My direct office number is or I could call you if that would be more convenient Yours sincerely Edward Barker cvdoc cvdoc
